email_body: Go out and see a movie tonight! ENTER FOR YOUR CHANCE TO WIN! James Bond, Wampole Dissolve/ Evolve, The Adventures of Pluto Nash, Spider-Man, Men in Black, City by the Sea, Feardotcom, Neutrogena, Maybelline, Ralph Fragrances. Tribute’s Bonnie Laufer talks to Friends star Jennifer Aniston, director Miguel Arteta and writer Michael White about working on the feature film, The Good Girl. Tribute’s Bonnie Laufer chats with Ricardo Montalban about getting back on the big screen as Grampa Cortez in Spy Kids 2. Tribute’s Bonnie Laufer talks to actor Jeremy Northam about starring in the romantic drama, Possession. S1MØNE, Serving Sara, The Good Girl, One Hour Photo. An island getaway for movie stars Ethan Hawke and Uma Thurman. British boys reserved? Gwyneth Paltrow's dating experiences in London. A one-on-one interview with Vin Diesel. Also featured in MOVIEMAIL next week: more interviews, more contests and much more movie buzz.
